channel.title: Neeed my web to host my server
channel.description: i need a way for my webiste to be able to host my server if so plz explain how i can

item.title: Neeed my web to host my server
item.dc:creator: @isaac2k4 isaac2k4
item.description:
@isaac2k4 wrote:

[quote=“Diablo II, post:2, topic:139132”]rofl uve got to be kidding me dude, comn get smart theres no way, the only way that u dont have to host ur server is if~

~you give someone ur server to host (which is bad unless hes ur friend)
~or u buy vps which hosts ur server but is extremely hard to set up. (its like enkrona which is runned on vps) and also it costs bout 50$+ for the base and 100$ and up for a good reliable vps[/quote]

actually yes you can host your server of a website. Dont post what you dont know.

You need MYSQL

Read full topic
